hero.title: Italy Travel Packages, Train Tickets & Attraction Passes
hero.subtitle: Discover Italy with our curated travel packages, book high-speed train tickets, and secure skip-the-line access to top attractions like the Uffizi Gallery and Neuschwanstein Castle.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Our App?
whyChoose.subtitle:
We simplify your travel planning with a fast, secure, and user-friendly platform.
Focus on the experience, not the logistics.

instantBooking.title: Instant Booking
instantBooking.description: Book your tickets in minutes, anytime, anywhere. Your travel plans are just a few taps away.

digitalTickets.title: Digital E-Tickets
digitalTickets.description: Receive your tickets directly on your phone. No printing needed—just show your screen and go.

securePayment.title: Secure Payment
securePayment.description: Your payments are protected with top-tier security. We support multiple payment methods.

multiLanguage.title: Multi-Language Support
multiLanguage.description: Our app and customer support are available in multiple languages to assist you better.

ourServices.title: Our Premier Services
ourServices.subtitle: We specialize in tickets for Europe's most sought-after destinations.

neuschwanstein.title: Neuschwanstein Castle Tickets
features: Guaranteed entry to Germany's fairytale castle.
Skip the notoriously long ticket lines.

uffizi.title: Uffizi Gallery Tickets
features: Access to Renaissance masterpieces in Florence.
Timed entry to avoid the crowds.

download.title: Get Your Tickets on the Go
download.subtitle: Download the Future Dream app for exclusive deals and manage your bookings effortlessly.

seo.title: Future Dream | Italy Train Tickets, Uffizi & Neuschwanstein
seo.description: Book tickets for Italy's high-speed trains (Trenitalia), the Uffizi Gallery in Florence, and Neuschwanstein Castle. Your one-stop app for European travel.
seo.keywords: Neuschwanstein Castle, German train tickets, Germany travel, DB train tickets, castle tickets, ticket booking, German rail, Germany travel, Italy train tickets, Uffizi Gallery, Florence, European travel

popularTours.title: Popular Travel Packages
popularTours.subtitle: Discover the most sought-after tours and experiences

promotion.title: Turn Every Ticket into a Travel Surprise
promotion.subtitle: Every purchase brings you closer to special travel surprises from us — book today and unlock more than just a trip.
promotion.feature1: Exclusive travel surprises with every booking
promotion.feature3: Unlock unique experiences beyond your ticket

exploreItaly.title: Discover Italy by Train
exploreItaly.intro1: Experience Italy's stunning landscapes and vibrant cities with its world-class high-speed rail network, Trenitalia.
exploreItaly.intro2: From the canals of Venice to the heart of Rome, traveling by train is the fastest and most scenic way to explore the country.

ice.title: High-Speed Frecciarossa
ice.description: Connects major cities like Rome, Florence, and Milan in just a few hours.

scenic.title: Tuscan Landscapes
scenic.description: Journey through rolling hills and picturesque vineyards on your way to Florence.

combo.title: Art & Rail Combo
combo.description: Book your Uffizi Gallery ticket along with your train to Florence for a streamlined cultural experience.

story.title: Story & History
story.content1: Built in 1560, it originally served as government offices (Uffizi means 'offices') for Florence.
story.content2: It houses the most important collection of Renaissance art, making it one of the world's most famous museums.

experience.title: Visual & Experience
experience.content1: The gallery features over 2,000 works, including Botticelli's 'The Birth of Venus,' sketches by da Vinci, and paintings by Michelangelo.
experience.content2: Walking through its corridors offers stunning views of the Arno River and Florence's historic cityscape.

tips.title: Travel Tips
tips.content1: Location: Florence city center, easily reachable on foot.
tips.content2: Booking tickets online in advance is highly recommended, as it often sells out, especially during peak season.
tips.content3: The best time to visit is in the morning to avoid large crowds.

story.title: Story & History
story.content1: Built in the 19th century by King Ludwig II of Bavaria, known as the 'Fairytale King.'
story.content2: It was inspired by German legends and operas and later served as the inspiration for Disneyland's Sleeping Beauty Castle.

experience.title: Visual & Experience
experience.content1: Nestled in the Alpine foothills, the white castle against the mountains and lakes creates a real-life fairytale setting.
experience.content2: The interior is lavishly decorated, combining Gothic and Byzantine styles, with the 'Singers' Hall' being particularly breathtaking.

tips.title: Travel Tips
tips.content1: Nearest train station: Füssen, about a 2-hour journey from Munich by ICE/regional train.
tips.content2: Upon arrival, you can take a bus or walk up the hill. Booking tickets online in advance is recommended to avoid queues.

paymentMethods.title: Flexible Payment Options
paymentMethods.subtitle: We support a variety of payment methods for your convenience.

creditCard.title: Credit Card
creditCard.description: We accept major credit cards including Visa, JCB, and MasterCard for secure and fast payment.

bankTransfer.title: Bank Transfer
bankTransfer.description: You can also pay via bank transfer. Please follow the instructions at checkout.

hero.title: Turn every ticket into a travel surprise
hero.subtitle: Discover your world of fun.

intro.title: About Future Dream
intro.subtitle: No matter when, no matter where, we'll help you find the best things to do and see.
intro.content: Looking for great deals on local attractions? Or the best hotel deals? Or a relaxing getaway? Future Dream has it all. With a few taps, your next adventure is ready.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: Bringing you closer to the world
mission.content: Whether it's discovering local gems or traveling abroad, we turn the world into your playground. Go explore!

simple.title: Simple and Easy
simple.content: From discovery and booking to the experience itself, we're here to make your journey effortless.

local.title: Authentic Experiences
local.content: Our local teams hand-pick the most authentic things to do, so you can enjoy the best of every destination.

curiosity.title: Endless Curiosity
curiosity.content: The world is vast! We maintain endless curiosity, constantly discovering new and unique things to do.

investors.title: Our Investors
investors.subtitle: We're proudly supported by some of the world's biggest investment firms.

partnerships.title: Corporate Partnerships
partnerships.subtitle: Collaborating with leading companies to deliver exceptional travel experiences.
partnerships.content: Our management team works closely with major corporations and industry leaders to expand our reach and enhance our services. Through strategic partnerships, we continue to innovate and provide seamless travel solutions for customers worldwide.

brand.title: Our Brand
brand.paragraph1: Future Dream was founded with a simple mission: to make European travel seamless and accessible for everyone. We believe that exploring the rich history and vibrant culture of Europe should be a joy, not a hassle.
brand.paragraph2: Our team is passionate about travel and technology, and we work tirelessly to create an app that is both powerful and easy to use. We partner with official ticket providers to ensure that you always get authentic tickets at the best prices.

product.title: Our Product
product.paragraph1: The Future Dream app is your one-stop shop for booking train tickets, and admission to top attractions across Italy and Germany. We offer a curated selection of the best travel experiences, from high-speed trains to iconic landmarks like the Uffizi Gallery and Neuschwanstein Castle.
product.paragraph2: With features like instant booking, digital e-tickets, and multi-language support, our app is designed to take the stress out of travel planning. Whether you're a seasoned traveler or a first-time visitor, Future Dream is your trusted partner for an unforgettable European adventure.

footer.aboutText: Your one-stop app for European travel, making it seamless to book tickets for trains and top attractions.

privacyPolicy.introduction: Future Dream (“we”, “our”, “us”) is committed to protecting your personal data and respecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, share, and protect your information when you use our services.

scope.title: 1. Scope
scope.content: This Privacy Policy applies to your use of the Future Dream App, including booking and purchasing European travel packages, train tickets, attraction tickets, and bundled travel products offered by third-party partners.

informationCollected.title: 2. Information We Collect
informationCollected.intro: Depending on how you use our services, we may collect:

items.account: Account Information: name, email, phone number, password.
items.booking: Booking and Payment Details: order history, payment method, billing details.
items.device: Device & Technical Data: IP address, device type, operating system, browsing activity.
items.communications: Communications: messages with customer support or partners.

informationCollected.consent: If you provide data about other travelers (e.g., for group bookings), you are responsible for obtaining their consent.

howWeUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.intro: We may use your information to:

items.process: Process bookings, payments, and deliver tickets.
items.send: Send confirmations, updates, and service-related messages.
items.provide: Provide personalized travel recommendations and promotions.
items.improve: Improve app performance and user experience.
items.comply: Comply with legal obligations (fraud prevention, audits, financial reporting).

sharing.title: 4. Sharing of Information
sharing.intro: We only share personal data when necessary:

items.partners: Service Partners (e.g., railway operators, attraction providers) to fulfill your bookings.
items.providers: Payment & Technical Providers for secure payment processing and hosting.
items.authorities: Government or Legal Authorities if required by law.

sharing.noSale: We do not sell your personal information to third parties.

marketing.title: 5. Marketing & Your Choices
marketing.content: We may send promotional messages via app notifications or email. You can opt out of marketing communications at any time without affecting your use of core services.

security.title: 6. Data Security
security.content: We use appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data. However, no method of online transmission or storage is completely secure.

retention.title: 7. Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your data only as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this Policy or as required by law. Once no longer needed, your data will be deleted or anonymized.

yourRights.title: 8. Your Rights
yourRights.intro: Depending on applicable law, you may have the right to:

items.access: Access and request a copy of your personal data.
items.correct: Correct or delete inaccurate or unnecessary data.
items.restrict: Restrict or object to our processing of your data.

yourRights.exercise: To exercise these rights, please contact us.

thirdParty.title: 9. Third-Party Links
thirdParty.content: Our app may contain links to third-party websites or services. Their privacy practices are governed by their own policies, and we are not responsible for their actions.

updates.title: 10. Updates to This Policy
updates.content: We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Significant changes will be announced through the App or our website.

contact.title: 11. Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, don't hesitate to get in touch with us at:

convenience.title: Convenience
convenience.description: One-stop ticketing that simplifies travel planning.

trust.title: Trust
trust.description: Transparent pricing and clear terms to avoid hidden traps.

discovery.title: Discovery
discovery.description: Through gamified promotions and bundled packages, every journey feels like an adventure.
